description.title: Nginx
texts: Nginx (pronounced as Engine-X) is a webs server that can fucntion as a reverse proxy server and a load balancer. It sits between a web server and the client
It recives client requests before before forwarding it to the server, and recives client's responses before they are delivered to them.

As a reverse proxy: It helps the web server to deliver responses to clients without revealing information about the server. This is useful to prevent attacks on the server. Nginx can also optimize performance through features like caching, SSL termination, and compression

As a load balancer: As a middleman, Nginx receives clients requests before the web server(s). Therefore, it can be used to evenly distribute traffic between multiple servers ensuring that a single server is not overloaded
